field.name: summary
field.value: Add ability for components activated in a custom way to opt out of container lifetime management

field.name: description
field.value:
Say components that are provided by {{UsingFactoryMethod}} should have at registration time ability to opt out of having lifetime concerns applied and from being tracked by the release policy if they're transient.
That should be a opt out mechanism as it may make or not make sense on a case by case basis. Since current behavior is to track them (and that's a reasonable default) it should stay that way.
